article_title: Rural SC hospitals explore avenues for help
article_text: Fifteen of the 17 hospitals in South Carolina that filled fewer than 30 percent of their beds in 2012 were in rural counties, and nine of those hospitals operate independently on what amounts to rural islands.

article_metadata.news-keywords: hospital, health, DHEC, rural, county, sc, help, assistance, patient, care
